item.title: Need some help... R+
item.dc:creator: @pur3_pik3r_9 pur3 pik3r 9
item.description:
@pur3_pik3r_9 wrote:

Ok, I just added beard. To make them work like runescape… Everything was all good, added it, no errors… Then bam!

I logged into my server, it disconnects me (everybody) and says this at the bottom of that chat thing.

Error: Packet size mismatchin getplayer pos:144 psize:6 Error: T2- 81,73,53- 6,2539,4716- -26,-47,,-104,7,-1,16

Any thing you know about that error? Kus I don’t lol…
Heres my player.java I added beards in.

playerProps.writeWord(0x100+pFeet); }if(playerLook[0] == 0) playerProps.writeWord(0x100 + pBeard); else playerProps.writeByte(0); } else { playerProps.writeWord(-1); playerProps.writeWord(npcId);

That’s the code for the beard. if you see anything wrong with the code that’s causing these errors, please let me know.

Read full topic
